sources.title: Dream House Nightmare | Full Movie | Mystery Drama
sources.description:
Dream House Nightmare - A woman, once featured as Mother of the Year, is obsessed with owning a new-build house which she imagines will be a cure-all for her dysfunctional family of redneck husband and simple, epileptic daughter. When a doctor and his pregnant wife purchase the property, she employs increasingly dangerous ploys to terrorise the couple into moving out.
2017.  Stars: Rachel G. Whittle, Terese Aiello, David A Cole

metadata.Plot: A young couple buy their dream home in New Orleans, only to be tormented by an obsessive mother who believes the house should be hers.
metadata.Actors: Rachel G. Whittle, Terese Aiello, David A Cole
